headline: GE Vernova, Other Power Stocks Weigh on the S&P 500
summary: Power companies GE Vernova, Vistra, and Constellation Energy are among the worst-performing companies on the S&P 500 Tuesday.

headline: Why Did Vistra Stock Drop Today?
summary: Vistra is one nuclear stock that looks almost cheap enough to buy.

headline: Dow Climbs 500 Points After Senate Passes Tax Bill
summary: The stock market’s rally broadened on Tuesday after the Senate passed President Donald Trump’s signature tax bill. The Dow rose 500 points, or 1.1%. The S&P 500 was down less than 0.1%. The Nasdaq Composite, dragged down by struggles by Tesla and other high-flying AI stocks after a blockbuster second quarter, was down 0.

headline: The Best and Worst S&P 500 Stocks During the 2nd Quarter—and How They Got There
summary: Shares of a crypto exchange surged more than 100%, while a beleaguered healthcare company deepened its losses.
